Pero tal vez el chiste 2 si es gracioso imaginate esto:

  2)
  Descartes g=
oes into a restaurant and orders a cup of coffee. He sits for a while, drin=
king his coffee and reading the paper. 
  A little while later, the waitres=
s comes by and asks him if he would like another cup. He says "I think not"=
 y entra un gallego al restaurant con un loro, entonces la moza le pregunta=
: =BFHabla el animal? Y el loro responde: =BFY yo qu=E9 s=E9? 

  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: H. Hernan Moraldo 
  To: JuegosAR@gruposyahoo.=
com.ar 
  Sent: Saturday, November 19, 2005 10:07 PM
  Subject: Re: [Juegos=
Ar] OT: Descartes


  Hmmm... adem=E1s, "pienso luego existo" no debe neces=
ariamente implicar "no pienso luego no existo" para que el chiste funcione.=


  "pienso luego existo" implica que en caso de suceder "no pienso", puede=
 suceder tanto "no existo" como "existo". Digamos que la situaci=F3n hasta =
el punto de "I think not" genera dos chistes diferentes posibles:


    1)
=
    Descartes goes into a restaurant and orders a cup of coffee. He sits fo=
r a while, drinking his coffee and reading the paper. 
    A little while l=
ater, the waitress comes by and asks him if he would like another cup. He s=
ays "I think not" and disappears. 


    2)
    Descartes goes into a resta=
urant and orders a cup of coffee. He sits for a while, drinking his coffee =
and reading the paper. 
    A little while later, the waitress comes by and=
 asks him if he would like another cup. He says "I think not" and doesn't d=
isappear. 

  S=F3lo el primer chiste es gracioso, por qu=E9 nos molestar=
=EDamos en contar el otro? As=ED como al jugar un juego, no percibimos toda=
s las sesiones de juego posibles en simult=E1neo, sino s=F3lo una, en el ca=
so de este chiste tampoco tenemos un recuento de todos los finales posibles=
, sino que s=F3lo de uno.






  El s=E1b, 19-11-2005 a las 12:33, H. Hern=
an Moraldo escribi=F3: 
> ojotaaaaaaaa
> "pienso luego existo" no implica "=
no pienso luego no existo"

Epa... no lo pens=E9 cuando le=ED el chiste. Es=
 buena...

Entonces tendr=EDa que ser: "He disappears, and he says 'I think=
 not'"

Pero entonces ya no tendr=EDa sentido :)
